sentences.en: Collect geological samples, faunal materials, botanical specimens, and sediments samples.
sentences.cn: 收藏地质样品 、 动物区系的资料 、 植物学的样品和沉积样品.

sentences.en: Functional Natural Substances, Fenugreek Gum, Fenugreek Saponin, Fenugreek Testa, Botanical Extract.
sentences.cn: 采购产品功能性的天然物质, 香豆胶, 胡芦巴皂甙, 香豆种, 植物提取物.

sentences.en: Herbalists dominated the sixteenth century botanical world.
sentences.cn: 本草学家在十六世纪曾统治了整个植物界.

sentences.en: His discovery was hailed as the botanical find of the century.
sentences.cn: 他的发现被誉为本世纪植物学的最重大发现。

sentences.en: How many stops are there to the Botanical Garden?
I am not very familiar with botanical names.
sentences.cn: 我不太熟悉植物学方面的名称.

sentences.en: My botanical interest is largely confined to the reproductive processes in vascular plants.
sentences.cn: 我对植物学的兴趣主要限于维管植物的生殖过程.

sentences.en: Others: greenhouse, botanical gardens, transport facilities, airports and so on.
sentences.cn: 其他: 温室 、 植物园 、 交通设施 、 机场等.

sentences.en: Studies of botanical ecology generally advanced more rapidly than those involving animals.
sentences.cn: 对植物生态学的研究通常比动物生态学的研究进展更为迅速.

sentences.en: The area is of great botanical interest.
sentences.cn: 这一领域有重大的植物学研究价值。

sentences.en: The botanical garden has turned into a wilderness.
The botanical name is lilium in the liliaceae family.
sentences.cn: 它的植物学上的名字是百合科百合属植物.

sentences.en: The place boasts a beautiful botanical garden with plants from all over the world.
sentences.cn: 那地方有个美丽的植物园,里面种着来自世界各地的树木花草.

sentences.en: There is a botanical garden in Paris.
Yet everyone comes unconsciously on amazing amount of botanical knowledge.
sentences.cn: 然而每个人在不知不觉中拥有大量的植物学知识.

words.tran_cn: 调查研究植物生长情况

trans.tran_en: relating to plants or the scientific study of plants
